alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 10:58AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Juab... southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 1130 AM MDT... At 1057 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 17 miles south of Vernon, or 31 miles west of Nephi, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Lofgreen, Tintic Junction, Jericho and Little Sahara State Park. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 124 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
